name: MPSImageAreaMax
desc: A filter that finds the maximum pixel value in a rectangular region centered around each pixel in the source image.

items.name: init(device: MTLDevice, kernelWidth: Int, kernelHeight: Int)
items.desc: Initializes the kernel with a specified width and height.

items.name: var kernelHeight: Int
items.desc: The height of the filter window. Must be an odd number.

items.name: var kernelWidth: Int
items.desc: The width of the filter window. Must be an odd number.
